name: Fig and Banana Loaf
author: MissV
summary: This hearty loaf is a healthy rendition of the classical banana bread.  Serves as an excellent start to any day, and is great for an afternoon tea.  Figs can be substituted with dates or raisins.
ingredients: ½ cup firmly packed brown sugar
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix together the eggs, soy milk, brown sugar, oil, and mashed bananas in a bowl until evenly blended; set aside
In a large bowl, stir together the whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon; pour in the egg mixture, and stir just until combined
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 55 minutes
Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack
